ygData.subject: RE: RE: centaur armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Crafted armor is lore but it can be sold and traded......so for warriors you will have to take the armor off your back (or legs) and sell it first then go and
ygData.messageBody:
Crafted armor is lore but it can be sold and traded......so for warriors you
will have to take the armor off your back (or legs) and sell it first then
go and get some more.....so I suggest you get the item for the quest again
first, then sell...incidentally the items that are required for each piece
(not including the store bought jewels) are NO DROP and LORE maybe that is
what you heard

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark S. Foster [mailto:markf@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 11:16 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor

From: "Mark S. Foster" <markf@...>

From what I hear, There LORE, NO DROP, So selling them is
out of the idea
----- Original Message -----
From: <omnibus@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 03, 1999 11:15 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] RE: centaur armor


> From: <omnibus@...>
>
> expensive? yes, in the short term maybe. in the long
term, if you aren't
> a warrior and cant wear the armor, i know that it can be
sold for
> 1500-2000pp (going price for greaves). not a bad return
on a couple
> hundred plat, not to mention the xp you get.
>
> On Tue, 3 Aug 1999, Mark S. Foster wrote:
>
> > From: "Mark S. Foster" <markf@...>
> >
> > Hmm, Has anyone tried to keep doing the same Quest over
and over again,
> > Yeah, It might be expensive, But would it be worth the
Exp in the long
run?
> >
> >

bubbles off 4
